Package gui

Class TestQuestionMiddleController

java.lang.Object
gui.TestQuestionMiddleController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TestQuestionMiddleController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
A controller class handling interaction with user in test execution session.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TestQuestionMiddleController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void calculateGrade()
    This function calculates the grade of a executed test and saves its' grade.
    void foceClose()
    This method will route the user to the final page, in a case where from some reason, The test has been locked (de-activated) during execution.
    int getMarkedAnswer()
    This method returns the answer that was marked using the relevant radio button.
    long getTimeDifference()
    This method checks the difference between system's current time and the test's starting time.
    void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
    This method initializes the window with all the data of test that needs to be displayed.
    void resetAnswers()
    This method resets the answers.
    void setFinalAnswerTable()
    This method initializes the final answers summary table which summarize the user all of his selected answers - giving him a chance to regret and change his answers.
    void setLastAnswer()
    This function retrieves and returns the value of the selected radio button.
    void setQuestions()
    This method initializes the questions needed to be displayed in the test.
    void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
    Standard controller starting mechanism.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • getTimeDifference

      public long getTimeDifference()
      This method checks the difference between system's current time and the test's starting time.
      Returns:
      the difference as a long variable.

    • calculateGrade

      public void calculateGrade()
      This function calculates the grade of a executed test and saves its' grade.

    • setQuestions

      public void setQuestions()
      This method initializes the questions needed to be displayed in the test.

    • getMarkedAnswer

      public int getMarkedAnswer()
      This method returns the answer that was marked using the relevant radio button.
      Returns:
      int represnting the index of the marked answer. (Indexes from 0 on...)

    • setLastAnswer

      public void setLastAnswer()
      This function retrieves and returns the value of the selected radio button.

    • resetAnswers

      public void resetAnswers()
      This method resets the answers.

    • setFinalAnswerTable

      public void setFinalAnswerTable()
      This method initializes the final answers summary table which summarize the user all of his selected answers - giving him a chance to regret and change his answers.

    • foceClose

      public void foceClose()
      This method will route the user to the final page, in a case where from some reason, The test has been locked (de-activated) during execution.
